content: Adjust Session Lifetime to define the time period before automatic logoff. After saving, logoff will be performed for all users.

comment.text: Adjust Session Lifetime defines the time period before automatic logoff. This setting will be applied to all users after saving, prompting them to log off. It appears in a portal settings category.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "سيتم تسجيل الخروج لجميع المستخدمين بعد الحفظ" is a literal translation but can be improved for clarity and naturalness. A better phrasing would convey the effect on existing sessions more gracefully.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم تسجيل خروج جميع المستخدمين الحاليين بعد الحفظ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Adjust Session Lifetime" as "Sessiya Müddəti təyin edin" is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing might be "Sessiya müddətini ayarlayın" or "Sessiya müddətini dəyişdirin". "Təyin edin" sounds more like assigning a value rather than adjusting a setting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sessiya müddətini ayarlayın

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "çıxış həyata keçiriləcək" is technically correct but sounds very formal and bureaucratic. A more user-friendly alternative would be more direct.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bütün istifadəçilər avtomatik olaraq çıxış edəcək

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'излизане' (logout) could be more precisely translated to 'изключване' in this context, which better conveys the action of ending a session.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Коригирайте Продължителността на Сесията, за да определите периода на време преди автоматично изключване. След запазване ще се извърши изключване за всички потребители.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Adjust Session Lifetime' is better translated as 'Establezca la duración de la sesión' or 'Configure la duración de la sesión'. 'Ajuste la duración de la sesión' is acceptable but slightly less idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Establezca la duración de la sesión

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'desconexión automática' is a correct translation for 'automatic logoff,'  'cierre de sesión automático' is more common and natural in Spanish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: cierre de sesión automático

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "Adjust" as "Կարգավորեք" is technically correct, but might be too formal for a user interface setting. A more user-friendly phrasing might be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a phrase like "Սահմանեք" (Set) or "Փոփոխեք" (Change) for a more approachable tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing "մինչև ավտոմատ դուրս գալը" (until automatic exit) is a bit awkward. "ավտոմատ լոգաութ" (automatic logout) would be more natural and commonly understood.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "մինչև ավտոմատ դուրս գալը" with "ավտոմատ լոգաութ".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after "ավտոմատ լոգաութ" is not consistent with the original English sentence's punctuation.  The sentence would flow better without it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the colon after "ավտոմատ լոգաութ".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Session Lifetime' is not accurately conveyed by 'セッションの有効期間'. '有効期間' implies validity, while 'Session Lifetime' refers to the duration. A better translation might be 'セッションライフタイム' (transliteration) or 'セッション持続時間' (session duration).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: セッションライフタイム or セッション持続時間

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "すべてのユーザーに対してログオフが実行されます" is slightly awkward.  It's technically correct, but could be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 保存後、すべてのユーザーはログオフされます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບອັດຕະໂນມັດ" (khao suu rabop attathomad) literally translates to 'automatically login'. The English phrase 'logoff' implies the opposite, 'logout'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປັບ Session Lifetime ເພື່ອກໍານົດໄລຍະເວລາກ່ອນການອອກຈາກລະບົບອັດຕະໂນມັດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'ການອອກຈາກລະບົບຈະໄດ້ຮັບການປະຕິບັດ' is a bit wordy and formal for a user-facing setting description. While not strictly incorrect, it could be improved for clarity and flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຫຼັງ​ຈາກ​ການ​ບັນ​ທຶກ​, ທຸກ​ຄົນ​ຈະ​ຖືກ​ອອກຈາກ​ລະ​ບົບ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'automātiskās atteikšanās' is a literal translation of 'automatic logoff' but sounds unnatural in Latvian. A more natural phrasing would be 'automātiski izrakstīšanās'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pielāgojiet sesijas ilgumu, lai noteiktu laika periodu pirms automātiski izrakstīšanās. Pēc saglabāšanas visi lietotāji tiks izlogoti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Adjust Session Lifetime' is not accurately reflected in 'Pas Duur van de sessie aan'. While 'Duur van de sessie' translates to 'Session Duration', 'Pas...aan' implies an action on the duration, but 'Adjust' can also imply a configuration change. A better translation could be 'Configure sessieduur'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configure sessieduur

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'afmelden' can be ambiguous. While it translates to 'logoff,' it also implies a formal disengagement or termination. 'Uitloggen' might be a clearer and more commonly used term for 'logoff' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Configure sessieduur om de periode vóór het automatisch uitloggen te definiëren. Na het opslaan wordt het uitloggen voor alle gebruikers uitgevoerd.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Dostosuj czas trwania sesji" is a reasonable translation of 'Adjust Session Lifetime', but 'czas trwania sesji' is a bit verbose. A more concise and natural translation could be 'Czas trwania sesji'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Czas trwania sesji

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "z obszaru" at the end of the sentence doesn't quite convey the meaning of "all users". It implies logging off from a specific area.  It's missing the nuance of system-wide logoff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: zostaną wylogowani

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'Session Lifetime' is translated as 'durata de expirare a sesiunii'. While technically correct, a more natural and common Romanian phrasing would be 'durata sesiunii'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: durata sesiunii

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English word 'logoff' is translated as 'deconectarea automată'. A more natural Romanian equivalent is simply 'deconectare'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: deconectare

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Adjust Session Lifetime" is translated as "Настройте Время существования сессии". While understandable, a more natural and accurate translation might be "Измените Продолжительность сессии" or "Настройте Длительность сессии".  "Время существования сессии" is technically correct but sounds a bit clunky in Russian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Измените Продолжительность сессии

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation maintains the sentence structure almost identically to the English. Consider slightly adjusting for better flow and naturalness in Russian. For example, placing "После сохранения" at the beginning of the second sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: После сохранения для всех пользователей будет произведен выход из системы.  Настройте Время существования сессии, чтобы определить период времени перед автоматическим выходом из системы.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Adjust Session Lifetime' is not accurately conveyed. 'Adjust' implies a small change, but the setting likely defines the entire lifetime. A better translation would emphasize setting or defining the duration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සරල කාලසීමාව (Session Lifetime) සකසන්න (Sakasan)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'වාරයේ' (waaraye) is used to describe 'Session Lifetime'. While it can mean 'period,' it’s not the most natural fit.  'කාලසීමාව' (Kaalasheemaava) is a more accurate and common term for 'lifetime' or 'duration' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සරල කාලසීමාව (Session Lifetime)  සකසන්න (Sakasan)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'සියලුම පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්' (siyalluma parishaalikalayin) translates to 'all users'.  While technically correct, a more common and understandable phrasing would be 'සියලු පරිශීලකයින්' (siyallu parishaalakalayin).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: සියලු පරිශීලකයින් (siyallu parishaalakalayin)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Session Lifetime' is translated as 'Čas trvania relácie'. While technically correct, 'Dĺžka relácie' might be a more natural and commonly used term in Slovak in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nastavte Dĺžka relácie, aby ste definovali časový úsek pred automatickým odhlásením.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation starts with a capitalized word 'Подесите'. While not strictly incorrect, it's more standard to begin a descriptive sentence with a lowercase letter in UI settings descriptions.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: подесите

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'odjavljivanja' is potentially incorrect. It's a verbal noun derived from 'odjaviti' (to log off), but it could be more naturally phrased.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Podesite Trajanje sesije kako biste definisali vremenski period pre automatskog isključenja. Nakon čuvanja, isključenje će biti izvršeno za sve korisnike.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Adjust Session Lifetime' is translated as 'Oturum Ömrü ayarlayın'. While technically correct, a more natural and user-friendly translation would be 'Oturum süresini ayarlayın' or 'Oturumun ömrünü ayarlayın'. 'Oturum Ömrü' sounds a bit formal and technical for a user-facing setting description.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Oturum süresini ayarlayın

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'automatic logoff' is translated as 'otomatik oturum kapatma'.  While correct, a more common and natural phrasing in Turkish would be 'otomatik çıkış'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: otomatik çıkış

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'After saving, logoff will be performed for all users' is translated as 'Kaydettikten sonra tüm kullanıcılar için oturum kapatma işlemi gerçekleştirilecektir'. This is grammatically correct but a bit verbose and formal. A more concise and natural translation would be 'Kaydettikten sonra tüm kullanıcılar otomatik olarak çıkış yapacaktır'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kaydettikten sonra tüm kullanıcılar otomatik olarak çıkış yapacaktır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "Session Lifetime" is translated as "Thời gian tồn tại của Phiên". While technically correct, a more natural and common translation for "Session Lifetime" in this context would be something like "Thời lượng phiên" or "Thời gian phiên".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "Thời lượng phiên" or "Thời gian phiên" instead of "Thời gian tồn tại của Phiên".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "自动注销到期会话" (automatic logout of expired sessions) isn't a direct and clear translation of "automatic logoff." It's technically correct but could be misinterpreted. A more natural phrasing might be "自动注销所有用户会话" or "自动注销用户会话".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 自动注销所有用户会话

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes the word '系统' (system). While not incorrect, it's unnecessary and makes the sentence less concise. The English doesn't specify 'system'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 保存设置后，所有用户会话将自动注销。
